page.title: WestJet Estimates Cut on Load Factor Woes
page.text: MONTREAL (Reuters) - Analysts chopped their fourth-quarter profit estimates for WestJet Airlines Ltd. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WJA.TO target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WJA.TO</A> on Wednesday and warned of turbulence in its share price, mainly because of computer woes that hurt its online bookings.
